name: Astradizel: Age Of Deliverance (Teaser Demo.)
description:
90 years ago, the legendary Champion of Astradizel defeated the Demon King by sealing him away. But today, that seal has been broken and the Demon King once again threatens to enslave the mortal races and destroy our way of life. You are Xephyr, the recently selected Champion of Astradizel and today, on your first day of adulthood you must set out on a quest to defeat the Demon King and his six Demon Lords. However, you may be faced with harsh realities and forced to make choices you may regret. How will your story unfold? Every choice you make affects the outcome of the story, will you save all of Astradizel or plunge it further into chaos and ruin? Now featuring multiplayer support! Thats right, play the game by yourself or play with a friend! Chat in game, trade items and fight together!

Release Date for the finished product remains unknown.

PvP not yet added.

Created by DeadlyFrogProductions.
